arts.sum: France coach Didier Deschamps said Thursday that there are both physical and psychological reasons for Kylian Mbappé's rough patch of form.

arts.ttl: France tie with Israel amid brief clashes in stands
arts.sum: There was a brief altercation between a small number of fans early into Thursday's Nations League soccer game between France and Israel despite heavy security inside the stadium.

arts.ttl: Fans clash at football match between France and Israel
arts.sum: Skirmish quickly quashed by security guards at stadium as riot police are deployed at ‘high-risk’ game A skirmish involving Israel fans broke out in the stands of the Stade de France during a tense match between Israel and France’s men’s football teams, but a heavy police presence ensured a repeat of the serious violence in Amsterdam was avoided. The game had been designated as “high risk” after the hooliganism and antisemitism witnessed in the Netherlands before and after a Europa League match between Ajax and Maccabi Tel Aviv last week. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: France draws with Israel in high-security operation to reach Nations League quarterfinals with Italy
arts.sum: France and Italy qualified for the quarterfinal stage of the revamped Nations League on Thursday as England got its revenge on Greece ahead of the imminent arrival of Thomas Tuchel as coach. The draw was enough to secure France a top-two finish in its group along with Italy, which beat Belgium 1-0 away thanks to Sandro Tonali’s 11th-minute goal.

arts.ttl: France 0-0 Israel: Highlights, man of the match, stats
arts.sum: Wasteful France progress to Nations League quarterfinals despite failing to find the breakthrough against a stern Israel defence.

arts.ttl: France and Israel fans fight in the stands as tensions boil over during Nations League clash
arts.sum: Police had beefed up their presence before the game

arts.ttl: France’s goalless draw with Israel marred by crowd trouble in Paris
arts.sum: Extra security measures had been put in place around the match, for which only an estimated 20,000 tickets had been sold.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | France 0-0 Israel: Les Bleus held amid tense and eerie atmosphere in Paris

arts.ttl: France and Israel fans fight during match as supporters run away screaming
arts.sum: The Nations League fixture between France and Israel in Paris was marred by scenes inside the stadium, where a number of fans were seen running away from clashes
